attributes.action: Ask her Majesty to disolve Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parliament and the law seem powerless to act against MP's that appear to have obtained money by deception. It is now time for all members of Parliament to face their constituents’ and let them decide who is fit to represent them. Dissolve Parliament and let the people decide.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
